title: Update home page hero text and replace CTA buttons with a single Get started link to Plans

requirements.text: Update the Home page hero section copy to use the following English text: headline "High Performance Game Servers" and subheadline "Experience lightning-fast performance, unbeatable reliability, and 24/7 support for all your favorite games."

quotes:
High Performance
Game Servers

Experience lightning-fast performance, unbeatable reliability, and 24/7 support for all your favorite games.

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page hero, the main H1 reads "High Performance Game Servers" (same styling as before).
On the Home page hero, the supporting paragraph reads exactly: "Experience lightning-fast performance, unbeatable reliability, and 24/7 support for all your favorite games."

requirements.text: On the Home page hero section, remove the existing "View Plans" and "Learn More" buttons and replace them with a single primary button labeled "Get started" that navigates to the Plans page route (/plans).

quotes: Remove the View Plans and learn more button and add Get started Button and link it with the plans page

acceptanceCriteria: The Home page hero CTA area shows exactly one button.
The single button label is exactly "Get started".
Clicking the "Get started" button navigates to /plans using the existing TanStack Router Link navigation (no full page reload).
The previously-present secondary hero button is not rendered on the Home page hero.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Do not change any other pages (e.g., About, Plans content) beyond what is necessary for the Home page hero update.
Do not add new authentication or payment behavior.
